name: amfori
goal: We are a the leading business association of global commerce that enables organisations to enhance human prosperity, use natural resources responsibly and drive open trade globally.  We call this Trade with Purpose.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: We are concerned with all initiatives that concern international trade and sustainability.
